name: Time Defense (wbschultz)
description:
The lich is sending his armies to destroy the time tower! As a scholar, you can't allow this to happen. Build towers with time based effects to slow down your enemies, rewind their motion, and protect time!

  • WASD - Movement
  • Click - Shoot/Build tower
  • Esc - Pause

Time Defense is our group's first experiment with longer game jams. We took the Brackey's Game Jam theme of "Rewind" and decided to run with it for one month. As such, the game is very much in a WIP state.
